message.content:
I need to identify the profit before tax value and decompose it into 4 component sub-items from the income statement.

Looking at the income statement, I can see:
- "Profit Before Tax" is explicitly listed with a value of 1373650.85
- This is calculated from the following components:
  - Total Revenue: 5565589.48 (positive contribution)
  - Total Cost: 3020000.00 (negative contribution)
  - Total Expenses: 1180531.44 (negative contribution)
  - Interest Income: 8592.81 (positive contribution)

The calculation would be:
Total Revenue - Total Cost - Total Expenses + Interest Income = Profit Before Tax
5565589.48 - 3020000.00 - 1180531.44 + 8592.81 = 1373650.85

This matches the Profit Before Tax value in the statement, confirming these are the appropriate sub-items.

```json
{"solution": {'value': '1373650.85', 'sub_items': {'sub_item value1': '5565589.48', 'sub_item value2': '3020000.00', 'sub_item value3': '1180531.44', 'sub_item value4': '8592.81'}}}
```
